Can syllables begin with a vowel?	no
Are calligraphers held in great esteem?	Yes
Have many European languages borrowed numerous words from it?	yes
Are the most active in Damascus and Cairo?	(bad question)
Do arabs consider literary Arabic?	(bad question)
Was Arabic vehicle in science?	NULL
Is it true that the sociolinguistic situation of Arabic provides a prime example of the linguistic phenomenon?	NULL
The sociolinguistic situation of Arabic provides a prime example of what?	the linguistic phenomenon of diglossia
Is arabic source of vocabulary?	NULL
Is arabic language of the Qur an?	NULL
Is it true that most speak Arabic as their native language?	NULL
Are pronouns in Literary Arabic marked for person , number and gender ?	yes
However , are non-human plural nouns grammatically considered to be feminine singular ?	yes
